title: Yani's Monkeys
creator_credit: Third Eye Productions, China Film and Channel 4 Television Corporation
brief_description: Yani, who lives in south-west Ching, started painting when she was 2 and a half years old. Her specialty is monkeys. Although still only a child, she is becoming famous throughout the world. The film shows her unique talent through past and present paintings and shows her brush technique by watching her at work.
